name: 1999 incident (demo)
description:
Wahat is this Game

  • simply this game is a playable analog horror enriched with Point and click elements
  • By the way, this is a demo 

Story

  • It's your first working day at the factory of the Fun And Joy company. A task manager is connected to you by radio to accompany you. But unfortunately, some things may not go as desired.

Gameplay

  • Simple Point And Click type gameplay

İnfo: 

  • This game was made with clickteam fusion 2.5 due to this, windows may detect this game as a virus, but this is not a virus
